name: Summon Shooter
description:
Legends tell of a grand wizard deep in the woods with the ability to manipulate space and time, able to augment a persons power as long as they have the gold to pay for it...

In this FPS roguelike you will traverse through 3 eras collecting gold and defeating enemies from the prehistoric times, medieval times, and the future!

The DX download includes 2 new abilities you can upgrade as well as an increase in difficulty. 

  • Mike Brown - Modeling and level design
  • Drew Kellett - Sound design
  • Tim - UI/UX and Modeling
  • Lui - Animation and Modeling 
  • Patrick - Modeling
  • Mike Osborne - Programming
  • Evan - Story
  • Chris - Level design
  • Chris Kopp - Level design
  • Jiovanni - Level Design
  • Aaron - Modeling
